status.description: The issue is open and awaits assignment.
status.name: Open

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
*+Objective+*
 We want to allow users to choose multiple location posting. Therefore, when a user selects L3 location, we can ask if they want to have this ad searchable under all L1 (Western Cape) or L2 (Cape Town) of that L3 e.g. a post in Century City (L3) will display under all Western Cape (L1) or Cape Town (L2). This aims to solve the SPAM problem in certain categories especially Services. We will make this a paid feature so users don't need to SPAM across locations covering their service area.

*+implementation+*
 * This feature is available for Services at the beginning but with potential extend to other categories. Therefore, we will use the leaf category feature price at the beginning for feature pricing then when user select multiple location posting feature, we will dynamic load the new pricing at L1 or L2 according to price list. 
 * The feature is configurable by price list info as we do for other feature. If we have a price number on multiple location posting feature for a specific node, FE will make this option available for user. Therefore, we can have more flexibility to manage this feature when we roll out for testing. 
 * It will be one ad showing L1 or L2 location on My Ad, SRP and VIP.
 * All view count, reply and other engagement data will be under this single ad ID.
 * For users, this is one ad they can manage their business across various locations.
 * Other features on this ad will also apply across locations.
 * When user select L1 or L2, get feature BAPI will fetch feature pricing at L1 or L2 level for FE dynamically update the pricing.
 * This will apply to Post/ Edit/ Draft BAPI. 

*+Mock-up+*
 * Desktop - [https://zpl.io/bWBk8jK]
 * Mobile - [https://zpl.io/bWB5xNM]

comments.body:
dev 5 points

qa manual testing 3 points automation 1 point

This ticket is related to location handling and related to search. This is something we bake for a very long time, and should fit nicely in what we would like to provide in future

Can we hold the implementation please? I would like to get clarification

Here to confirm that this ticket has been on the roadmap and ZA will go for Location Tree as agreed.
Geo location will be a separated discussion.

[~john] i update the ticket following our one on one call today. BE will make sure this feature is implemented in the configurable way as of the other features so u have more flexibility to manage the roll out and pricing onwards. Think it's time to kick off the discussion with Aileen and Claire about pricing and roll out strategy.

[~justin] one thing to notice is that when user selects multiple location, L1 or L2, FE needs to request feature price update. Please align with [~evan2] about implementation. 

[~qblanchais] we will need to move urgent to the bottom of the page to avoid confusion. Besides, we can only show multiple location option once user selects leaf as we still post this ad following current system mechanism.

As discussed,  we will use feature name like

MUL_LOCATION_L1

MUL_LOCATION_L2

 

In this way,  post ad / edit ad / draft ad flow won't be impacted.

 

[~john]  will help create tickets to address changes in 

BAPI - GET feature by category & location

items.fromString:
*+Objective+*
We want to allow users to choose multiple location posting. Therefore, when a user selects L3 location, we can ask if they want to have this ad searchable under all L1 (Western Cape) or L2 (Cape Town) of that L3 e.g. a post in Century City (L3) will display under all Western Cape (L1) or Cape Town (L2). This aims to solve the SPAM problem in certain categories especially Services. We will make this a paid feature so users don't need to SPAM across locations covering their service area.

*+implementation+*
* This feature is available for Job and Services at the beginning but with potential extend to other categories. 
* When user chooses a leaf location, we will allow users to purchase a package to have their listing searchable in all leaf locations under the L1 or L2 location of that leaf location chooses.
* It will be one ad showing L1 or L2 location on My Ad, SRP and VIP.
* All view count, reply and other engagement data will be under this single ad ID.
* For users, this is one ad they can manage their business across various locations.
* Other features on this ad will also apply across locations.

*+Mock-up+*
* Desktop - https://zpl.io/bWBk8jK
* Mobile - https://zpl.io/bWB5xNM
